- Enabled the successful execution of business strategies across technology platforms providing leadership for Agile teams. - Built high performing teams creating innovative products for the firm in various verticals including Schwab Advisory Services, Retail web Technology and Digital Platform Solutions.- Coached teams to adopt Continuous Delivery strategy and Lean engineering practices to accelerate time to market.
